Name: boron trifluoride production | boron trifluoride | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals
Description: The technology considered for the production of boron trifluoride in this dataset is by the reaction of HF (hydrofluoric acid) and H3BO3 (boric acid), using oleum as a dehydrating agent.;;;Brotherton, R..: Boron Compounds.
